scenario: The global Programmatic Advertising Market is expected to reach a valuation of USD 116.57 billion by 2029, growing at a Compound Annual Growth Rate (CAGR) of 15.27% from 2023 to 2029. The market is driven by advancements in Real-Time Bidding Technology, increased emphasis on data-driven marketing strategies, and the rise in mobile advertising. Key stakeholders in the market include advertisers, agencies, publishers, and ad tech companies. The market is dominated by the North American region, with notable companies such as Alphabet Inc., Meta Platforms, Inc., Amazon.com, Inc., Microsoft Corporation, and Alibaba Group Holding Limited. Despite challenges related to ad fraud and data privacy, the market is expected to advance assertively with key players driving innovations and improving transparency in programmatic transactions. The market is expected to be driven by the growth of Connected TV (CTV) and video advertising.
